prompts: Create a grass-type Pokemon that resembles a cute deer with colorful antlers.
Imagine a small Pokemon that can change colors with the seasons, like Deerling.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in grassy fields and has a gentle personality.
Show me a Pokemon with a leafy crown that lives in forest habitats.
Generate a Pokemon that looks like a fawn and has unique seasonal forms.
Give me a Pokemon with a bright orange body and white accents, perfect for spring.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of nature and the changing seasons.
